name: Get Dem Cards
description:
Help Regina, an upcoming game developer who hasn't got a ticket for GDC (Game Developers Conference). Help her burst in and collect as many business cards before the police catch her.

This game was for a game jam https://itch.io/jam/notgdcjam2019 and the theme was
- Game Conference and Events
- The Gaming Industry
- Game Designer Parties
- Fear of Missing Out
- Minimalism

Hence the level only consists of the actual GDC floor plan  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 

Have fun!

Controls 

WASD to move & SHIFT to run

Mouse to rotate
